title: Episode 91: E-Cigs and Other Drugs (w/Dr. Todd Hillhouse)
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: In our first episode of the season, Georjeanna and Ryan talk with Dr. Todd Hillhouse of the University of Wisconsin-Green Bay Psychology program about his research on electronic cigarettes and other drugs of abuse. Plus, we talk about emojis in our new segment, A Positive Note.

description: In our first episode of the season, Georjeanna and Ryan talk with Dr. Todd Hillhouse of the University of Wisconsin-Green Bay Psychology program about his research on electronic cigarettes and other drugs of abuse. Plus, we talk about emojis in our new segment, A Positive Note.
